sources.title: The Loners
sources.description: Stein is a half-blood Indian who is being chased by the police for accidentally killing a cop. He joins up with a friend and a girl and they get involved in a robbery and more killing.

sources.title: The Loners (1972)
sources.description: On his motorcycle Stein, a half-blood Indian, tries to stay out of the hands of the police, who are chasing him for accidentally killing a cop. Together with his friend Alan and a beautiful but desperate girl Stein will get involved in a robbery and more death. The police intensify the search, but the three won't give up that easily. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-loners-1972/

metadata.Plot: On his motorcycle Stein, a half-blood Indian, tries to stay out of the hands of the police, who are chasing him for accidentally killing a cop. Together with his friend Alan and a beautiful but desperate girl Stein will get involved in a robbery and more death. The police intensify the search, but the three won't give up that easily...
metadata.Actors: Dean Stockwell, Patricia Stich, Todd Susman
